title: Encounter
description: The crew runs into something. This is rarely good news.

title: Resources
description: Tools, data crystals, A-Metal cubes—these are what Divers risk their lives for (and what the KSA is willing to pay for).

title: Xenoanthropological Artifact
description: Cultural, historical, or ethnologically interesting finds. These include notes on architectural elements, pictograms, art—anything that might describe the Årsaidh (or another civilization).

title: Hazard Manifestation
description: An encounter with the Site Hazard (the Site’s defining threat or obstacle).

title: Locked Access Point
description: A closed door (or similar barrier) that the crew must bypass to progress.

title: Dread Event
description: Not everything a crew encounters has a direct, rational explanation. The universe is a big place and the insignificant human mind cannot comprehend its vastness.

title: Automated Security Measures
description: At the end of the day, a crew of Divers are no better than tomb robbers breaking into places they shouldn’t be in. Sometimes those places fight back.

title: Fixed Event
description: A clearly defined problem or circumstance for the crew to deal with.

title: Random Occurrence
description: This result requires the GM or solo player to interpret a few words, in the light of recent events and the type of Site the crew is in, to produce some unique challenge or situation.
